translation.en: [woman] It came to me in a dream.
translation.de: Es kam mir in einem Traum.

translation.en: Hair is beauty.
Hair is emotion.
Hair is our heritage.
Hair tells us who we are, where we've been,
translation.de: Unser Haar verrät uns, wer wir sind, woher wir kamen

translation.en: and where we're going.
-My name is Sarah Breedlove. -[crowd cheering]
Making products for our hair is my passion.
Hasn't been easy,
but no matter what, I refuse to give up the fight.
translation.de: aber egal wie, ich weigere mich, aufzugeben.

translation.en: Addie Munroe's Magical Hair Grower!
Fifty cents a tin. Get Magical Hair Grower right here!
translation.de: Fünfzig Cent pro Dose. Magisches Haarwuchsmittel!

translation.en: You got dandruff, ma'am?
You got bald patches?
Hair that won't grow? I got your fix! Right here, ladies!
translation.de: Wächst Ihr Haar nicht? Ich habe etwas für Sie!

translation.en: Magical Hair Grow--
[woman] Heard of that stuff.
Do it work?
Saved my life.
[Sarah] Hair is power.
You can't imagine what it's like to lose it.
translation.de: Sie haben keine Ahnung, wie es ist, sie zu verlieren.

translation.en: Seems like I was born to struggle.
The life of a washerwoman is hard.
translation.de: Als Waschfrau hat man es nicht leicht.

translation.en: I'd scrub my fingers to the bone for pennies.
translation.de: Für wenige Pennys schrubbte ich mir die Finger wund.

translation.en: Most days, I can't even make ends meet.
translation.de: Meist kam ich kaum über die Runden.

translation.en: After a while, I guess I just lost hope-- forgot how to dream.
translation.de: Nach einer Weile verlor ich die Hoffnung, vergaß, wie man träumt.

translation.en: That's when my hair started falling out.
translation.de: Da fingen meine Haare an auszufallen.

translation.en: My husband Davis only made things worse.
translation.de: Mein Mann Davis? Er machte es nur schlimmer.

translation.en: He was arrested, and when he came back, he was a changed man.
translation.de: Er saß ein. Nach seiner Rückkehr war er ein anderer Mann.

translation.en: [Davis] You look like a mangy dog.
translation.de: Du siehst aus wie ein Köter.

translation.en: -[Sarah] Baby, wait, don't go. -[Davis] No.
[Sarah] Please. Davis.
[Sarah] I was devastated.
Didn't know what I was gonna do.
I used to wonder if God don't like ugly,
why did he make me?
With so much beauty in this world, how come I got so little?
translation.de: Wie konnte ich in einer so schönen Welt so wenig Schönheit abbekommen?

translation.en: And then everything changed.
I'm Addie Munroe, and I would like to talk with you
translation.de: Ich bin Addie Munroe. Ich möchte mit Ihnen reden,

translation.en: about my new hair product.
You all right?
Is anyone here?
I'm-- I'm gonna help you.
It's gonna be just fine.
Oh, dear.
Oh, it's okay.
What happened?
I started using the Hair Grower that day.
translation.de: Damals fing ich mit dem Mittel an.

translation.en: In a few months' time, my hair came back.
Look at how your hair is growing.
Thanks to you.
I don't know why I'm so surprised. My Magical Hair Grower is magical.
translation.de: Warum bin ich so überrascht? Mein Haarwuchsmittel ist magisch.

translation.en: Yes, indeed, Addie.
Yes, indeed.
[Sarah] Addie's Hair Grower worked.
My hair grew back.
And so did my confidence.
Now I got me a new man, CJ, who loves me and treats me right.
translation.de: Ich habe einen neuen Mann. CJ, er liebt mich und ist gut zu mir.

translation.en: My hair grew back so good, I thought, maybe I could sell it myself.
translation.de: Meine Haare wuchsen so gut, dass ich das Mittel selbst verkaufen wollte.

translation.en: That's why I wanna sell your Hair Grower.
That's why I wanna sell your Hair Grower.
That's why I wanna sell your Hair Grower.
But what do I say when the customers complain about the sulfur smell?
translation.de: Und wenn sich jemand über den Schwefelgeruch beschwert?

translation.en: Oh, smile and say, "That's how you know the product is working."
translation.de: Lächle und sag: "So wissen Sie, dass es funktioniert."

translation.en: Here.
I put it on at night.
Tie it up real good. By morning, the smell's gone.
translation.de: Wickle ein Tuch drum. Am Morgen ist der Geruch weg.

translation.en: Mostly.
Now that's a tasty idea. Thanks.
translation.de: Das ist eine gute Idee. Danke.

translation.en: [Addie] If a washerwoman like Sarah can figure it out,
translation.de: Wenn eine Waschfrau wie Sarah daraufkommt,

translation.en: y'all should have no problem.
You've just got to convince the customers
that by using my product, that they'll look like me.
translation.de: dass sie mit dem Produkt aussehen werden wie ich.

translation.en: Or you all, at least.
No. No...
But, it... It works. Trust me.
You gals will be fine. You'll get the hang of it soon.
translation.de: Ihr schafft das. Bald habt ihr den Dreh raus.

translation.en: In the meantime, just smile a lot.
translation.de: In der Zwischenzeit lächelt einfach viel.

translation.en: They just get younger and dumber, don't they?
translation.de: Sie werden nur jünger und dümmer, nicht?

translation.en: Maybe I could sell your product.
I'd be honored, in fact.
Oh. [chuckles]
I don't think sales is for you. [laughs]
translation.de: Das Verkaufsgeschäft passt nicht zu dir.

translation.en: I've been singing your praises for almost two years.
translation.de: Ich singe seit zwei Jahren Loblieder auf dich.

translation.en: I got you, what? Eight new customers?
Mmm. That's not the same as selling door-to-door, though.
translation.de: Das ist nicht dasselbe wie das Haustürgeschäft.

translation.en: Oh, I know everything about Hair Grower. I'm proof that it works.
translation.de: Ich weiß alles über das Mittel. Ich bin Beweis für seinen Erfolg.

translation.en: Sarah, I know what I'm doing.
It's business.
Nothing personal.
Hiring a bunch of mulatto gals to con folks ain't gonna work.
translation.de: Die Mulattinnen werden keinem was vormachen.

translation.en: Even a fool knows they didn't get good hair from your product. Their mamas and grandmamas got raped.
translation.de: Die verdanken ihr Haar keinem Produkt. Ihre Mütter wurden vergewaltigt.

translation.en: Language.
All I'm saying is...
when a customer looks at my hair,
they'll know they're seeing what your product can do.
translation.de: weiß, was dein Mittel bewerkstelligen kann.

translation.en: Colored women will do anything to look like me.
translation.de: Farbige Frauen tun alles, um wie ich auszusehen.

translation.en: Even if deep down they know they can't.
translation.de: Obwohl sie wissen, dass es nicht geht.

translation.en: Now we've got a good arrangement here.
Laundry for hair treatments. Let's not complicate things.
translation.de: Wäsche gegen Haarbehandlungen. Machen wir es nicht kompliziert.

translation.en: You saw the laundry in the back.
I'll have it for you on Friday.
[Sarah] I was hesitant at first, but then I realized...
translation.de: Ich zögerte zunächst, doch dann wurde mir klar:

translation.en: this is my calling.
That I could help others the way Addie helped me.
translation.de: Anderen zu helfen, so wie Addie mir geholfen hatte.

translation.en: And that's why I'm here.
It worked for me. It'll work for y'all.
translation.de: Es funktionierte bei mir. Bei Ihnen wird es das auch tun.

translation.en: That's one hell of a story.
Give me one tin.
Thank you.
Me too.
-[woman 1] I'll take one. -[woman 2] How much is it?
translation.de: -Ich auch. -Wie viel? Das lässt Haare wachsen?

translation.en: [woman 3] She said it grow hair?
[woman 4] Thank you, baby.
[woman 5] It's worth the money.
[woman 6] I can't wait to try!
[Sarah] Let me know how you doin' with it. Check back in.
translation.de: Halten Sie mich auf dem Laufenden.

translation.en: -All right, then! -Thank you!
♪They just wanna talk that stuff Till I hit 'em with the realness ♪
-Sarah? What are you doin' here? -[Sarah] I did it.
translation.de: Sarah? Was machst du hier? Ich tat es.

translation.en: I sold 20 tins.
What now?
I borrowed a few tins of your Hair Grower.
translation.de: Ich lieh mir ein paar aus.

translation.en: After I told you no?
Just to see if I could sell 'em!
But you can't. It don't make sense!
translation.de: Das kannst du doch nicht tun!

translation.en: -I figured if I just showed you-- -[Addie] You stole from me?
After everything I've done for you?
translation.de: Nach allem, was ich für dich tat?

translation.en: No, I'd never steal from you! I brought all the money. It's all for you!
translation.de: Nein, niemals! Ich habe das ganze Geld dabei.

translation.en: I got you back on your feet.
I confided in you.
How could you?
I just wanted to show you that I can sell.
We can make a lot of money together. I got ideas-- Are you out of your mind?
translation.de: -Wir könnten reich werden. Ich habe Ideen. -Bist du verrückt?

translation.en: Even in your Sunday best,
you look like you just stepped off the plantation.
translation.de: siehst du aus wie frisch von der Plantage.

translation.en: These are my products.
And I will not have the likes of you associated with them.
translation.de: Eine wie du soll nicht damit assoziiert werden.

translation.en: Sorry for overstepping.
It won't happen again.
For Addie's newest sales agent.
What happened?
I ain't got the right look.
Now, wait a minute, now you...
You're the most beautiful woman in the world.
translation.de: Du bist die schönste Frau der...

translation.en: -Stop. -[CJ] No.
All these years I done made ads, I'd drawn every type of face there is.
translation.de: Ich bin seit Jahren in der Werbung. Ich zeichnete jedes Gesicht.

translation.en: And ain't none more beautiful than yours.
Tell me what happened.
She treated me like I was nothing, CJ.
translation.de: Sie behandelte mich wie Dreck, CJ.

translation.en: I thought we was friends.
Week after week, I sat in that chair. Told her stuff I ain't never told nobody.
translation.de: Wochenlang trafen wir uns. Sie weiß alles von mir.

translation.en: I should've known I was just a customer to her.
translation.de: Dabei war ich nur ihre Kundin.

translation.en: And an ugly one at that. Okay, stop.
I ain't gonna let you keep beating up on yourself, you hear?
You hear me?
I love you, CJ.
[CJ chuckles] Come here.
What you makin'?
From now on, I'm doing my own hair, making my own hair grower.
translation.de: Von jetzt an mache ich mein eigenes Haarwuchsmittel.

translation.en: I'm through with Addie Munroe.
[woman] Mama!
What you doin' up?
Just workin' on a little something. Sit, there's something I wanna try.
translation.de: Ich arbeite an etwas. Setz dich. Wir probieren es aus.

translation.en: What is it?
Hair grower. Maybe.
Just something I'm fiddling around with.
Mmm. Smells better than Addie's already.
Just trying to figure out the right mix.
Where you been?
[woman] Ray Ray's Bar was hot tonight,
translation.de: In Ray Ray's Bar ging es heiß her.

translation.en: and me and John was dancing the Big Bear Dance all night long.
translation.de: John und ich tanzten die ganze Nacht den Bärentanz.

translation.en: Just... mm-mm-mmm.
-John, huh? -Mm-hmm.
[laughs] The guitar player?
Sit... Sit your behind down!
What did I tell you about that sponger?
translation.de: Was sagte ich über den Schmarotzer?

translation.en: [sighs] You ain't even met him yet.
I can tell by the way you talk about him, he ain't got no money.
translation.de: Ich weiß auch so, dass er kein Geld hat.

translation.en: I know you think I'm puttin' on airs.
But...
you ain't cute or clever enough
translation.de: ...du bist weder süß noch klug genug,

translation.en: to survive gettin' knocked up by some do-nothin' musician.
translation.de: um dich von einem nichtsnutzigen Musiker schwängern zu lassen.

translation.en: Gotta find somebody who'll make your life better. Like CJ.
translation.de: Such dir einen, der dir das Leben erleichtert, wie CJ.

translation.en: Not having this conversation again.
You're too idle.
You need to call Dr. Collins.
He stood me up, remember?
That glass eye he got give me the willies.
So? He's a doctor. And you ain't gettin' much younger.
translation.de: Und? Er ist Arzt. Und du wirst nicht jünger.

translation.en: You either go to college or find yourself a husband, you hear?
translation.de: Entweder gehst du aufs College oder heiratest, hörst du?

translation.en: -[groans] -What's wrong?
My scalp is on fire, Mama.
Okay, that's the last time I make it with lye. Come on!
translation.de: Das war das letzte Mal mit Lauge. Komm!

translation.en: Ooh! Just gotta get it out.
-[laughs] -[woman 1] Thank you, sister Sarah.
[woman 2] My hair grew two inches!
[woman 1] God bless you.
Hair Grower works!
[Lelia] Mama, you did it! You made a beautiful hair grower. I'm so proud of you.
translation.de: Mama, du hast es geschafft. Ich bin stolz auf dich.

translation.en: -Here you go. -[woman] Okay.
Sarah, I hear you. Open up.
translation.de: Sarah, ich höre dich. Mach auf.

translation.en: Just a minute!
A few weeks ago, you left clean laundry on my doorstep.
translation.de: Vor einigen Wochen hast du Wäsche vor meine Tür gestellt.

translation.en: Then, nothing.
Thought maybe the Klan got you.
translation.de: Ich dachte, der Klan hat dich.

translation.en: [coughs] Well, been a little sick.
You might not wanna get too close.
translation.de: Komm mir besser nicht zu nahe.

translation.en: You can imagine my surprise when I heard Sarah Breedlove not only lives...
translation.de: Ich war überrascht, als ich hörte, dass Sarah Breedlove nicht nur lebt,

translation.en: but is out testing hair grower.
-Me? That ain't-- -Better not be my tins.
Rest assured...
we're settled up.
You really think you can compete with me?
[smacks lips] Suit yourself,
but you'll fail soon enough.
And when you do, I got a hamper full of dirty laundry with your name on it.
translation.de: Und dann habe ich einen Korb mit Dreckwäsche für dich.

translation.en: -CJ! -[CJ] Hmm?
-[laughs] CJ! -[CJ] Hmm?
Your sister wants me to send her 20 jars of Hair Grower,
translation.de: Ich soll deiner Schwester 20 Gläser Haarwuchsmittel schicken.

translation.en: and she sent me money.
Peg-- Peggie sent money?
It's a miracle!
I think God is finally smiling down on me.
translation.de: Gott meint es endlich gut mit mir.

translation.en: She said she let her choir director try some of the product I sent,
translation.de: Sie ließ ihre Chorleiterin das Produkt probieren.

translation.en: and now all the sopranos want it.
Huh. It says here, more Negroes are moving to Indianapolis.
translation.de: Hier steht, mehr Schwarze ziehen nach Indianapolis.

translation.en: Property is cheap now on account of the recession and factories closing.
translation.de: Immobilien sind wegen der Rezession und der vielen Fabrikschließungen billig.

translation.en: As soon as Negroes move in, white folks run for the hills.
translation.de: Sobald die Schwarzen kommen, ergreifen die Weißen die Flucht.

translation.en: -[Sarah laughs] -Can you imagine?
Ofays go broke and they just up and close a factory, I mean, a whole factory, just like that.
translation.de: Die blassen Weißen gehen pleite und schließen ganze Fabriken.

translation.en: Mmm. How is Cleophus gettin' along all by his lonesome?
-Only your sister to look after him? -Daddy's doin' just fine.
translation.de: -Er hat nur deine Schwester. -Daddy geht es gut.

translation.en: What you gettin' at?
My product is just as good as Addie's. Maybe better.
translation.de: Mein Produkt ist so gut wie Addies. Vielleicht besser.

translation.en: Definitely smells better.
I can't be a washerwoman for the rest of my life, CJ.
translation.de: Ich kann nicht auf ewig Waschfrau bleiben.

translation.en: Miss Jessie said there's three million Negro women in America.
translation.de: Laut Miss Jessie leben drei Millionen schwarze Frauen in den USA.

translation.en: If I can get 'em all to buy just one jar of Hair Grower,
translation.de: Würde jede nur eine Dose meines Mittels kaufen,

translation.en: I'll be a millionaire.
-Well, I can't argue with that. -Yeah.
We'd have to leave St. Louis, though.
I'd never get anywhere in Addie Munroe's shadow.
translation.de: Hier stehe ich nur in Addies Schatten.

translation.en: I ain't movin' to Indianapolis.
I love you, but I ain't movin'.
I ain't movin'.
[Sarah] Indianapolis, here we come!
Where is Lelia? She better not make us miss this train.
translation.de: Wo ist Lelia? Wir verpassen besser nicht den Zug.

translation.en: Breaking up with John, thank Jesus.
[Lelia] Mama! [laughing] Mama!
We got hitched.
[laughs] You almost had me.
Nice to finally meet you, John.
You're a good sport to help with her luggage.
translation.de: Nett, dass du mit dem Gepäck hilfst.

translation.en: -But we gotta be on our way. -No, Mama.
John is my husband. He's comin' with us.
translation.de: John ist mein Mann. Er kommt mit.

translation.en: Nice to meet you, Mom.
Lord, what did you do?
I got married, like you said.
Welcome to the family, son.
-Good luck. -You pregnant?
No! I love him.
And he's not a do-nothin' either.
translation.de: Und er ist auch kein Faulenzer.

translation.en: John's gonna open a juke joint.
-[Sarah] A juke joint? -[John] Mm-hmm.
Let's go.
I did like you said.
I found a rat.
[Sarah] Oh.
Easy, Cleophus. Money's tight. We gotta make it stretch.
translation.de: Langsam, Cleophus. Das Geld ist knapp. Es muss eine Weile reichen.

translation.en: Missy, I sure don't mind helpin',
but I don't take orders no more.
translation.de: aber ich nehme keine Befehle mehr entgegen.

translation.en: Lincoln freed me 40 years back!
That's why I'm gonna pay you.
And that's why you're my favorite daughter-in-law!
translation.de: Darum bist du meine liebste Schwiegertochter.

translation.en: Keep your eyes on your work. You're spilling more than you're filling.
translation.de: Du verschüttest mehr, als du einfüllst.

translation.en: Can I have my paper back?
If you don't like it here, you're welcome to find yourself other lodging,
translation.de: Such dir gern eine eigene Unterkunft.

translation.en: gainful employment.
Yeah, how's that juke joint coming?
From now on...
you on rat duty.
And take that hat off! You're inside.
translation.de: Nimm die Mütze im Haus ab!

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
Living room window.
Baby, you got to show the people some razzle-dazzle. Some hope!
translation.de: Baby, du musst den Leuten etwas bieten. Etwas Hoffnung!

translation.en: Well, but not false hope.
I ain't promisin' long, silky hair or whatever you put in this ad.
translation.de: Keine seidigen langen Haare wie in deiner Werbung.

translation.en: -What you want me to change? -Work in my story.
Make it personal. Add some testimonials or something.
translation.de: Mach es persönlich. Nimm Kundenzitate oder so.

translation.en: Folks will take a chance on my product if they believe in me. Right, Peggie?
translation.de: Die Leute müssen an mich glauben, nicht, Peggie?

translation.en: Yup! You gotta have heart.
Okay. Okay, Peggie.
I'll see what I can do.
[Sarah] Walker Hair Company. Got a nice ring to it, don't it?
translation.de: "Walker Hair Company." Das klingt gut, nicht?

translation.en: Gotta admit, you're sure on to something.
translation.de: Du bist auf dem richtigen Weg.

translation.en: Hair is in our blood.
All your uncles were barbers.
Just 'cause they've gone on to glory don't mean their legacy gotta die too.
translation.de: Sie erlangten keinen Ruhm, aber das Erbe muss nicht sterben.

translation.en: One day all of this will be yours.
translation.de: Eines Tages gehört all das dir.

translation.en: I want you to learn the business.
-Why? -Do something with your education.
I got a husband now.
Who is about as useful as a bucket without a bottom.
translation.de: So nützlich wie ein Eimer ohne Boden.

translation.en: Well, John and I are still gonna open up that juke joint.
translation.de: John und ich eröffnen eine Kneipe.

translation.en: I think he found a barn just outside of town.
-[woman] Thank you. -There you go.
After all I went through to get out of the South?
translation.de: Nachdem wir dem Süden endlich entkamen?

translation.en: Washed clothes till my hands were raw to put you through school.
translation.de: Ich wusch mir die Hände wund, damit du zur Schule gehen konntest.

translation.en: Maybe even college.
Now all you wanna do is serve liquor to ex-cons and hustlers.
translation.de: Jetzt willst du Ex-Häftlingen und Gaunern Schnaps servieren.

translation.en: Hair is your dream, not mine.
-So what's your dream? -I don't know yet.
So what happens when John runs off with a bar floozy?
translation.de: Was, wenn John mit einem Flittchen davonläuft?

translation.en: Then what?
Either you're back with me, or you're whoring.
translation.de: Du kommst zu mir oder gehst anschaffen.

translation.en: Well, John says I have a knack for entertaining.
translation.de: John sagt, ich kann Leute gut unterhalten.

translation.en: Right. So whorin', then.
You can be so cold-blooded sometimes, Mama.
All I'm sayin' is don't gamble your future away on that man.
translation.de: Verspiel nur nicht deine Zukunft wegen diesem Kerl.

translation.en: Any man! Always make your own money.
-But... -Nope, no buts.
-How you doin', ma'am? -[Lelia] Good mornin'.
My name is Lelia, and this is my mama.
translation.de: Ich bin Lelia, und das ist meine Mama.

translation.en: We have a product here that I'm sure will change your life.
translation.de: Und unser Produkt wird Ihr Leben verändern.

translation.en: Now, when I tell you this will make your hair grow faster than anything...
translation.de: Wenn ich Ihnen sage, dass Ihre Haare damit schneller wachsen als...

translation.en: ♪ Have I been hiding? ♪ ♪ Wasting all my days ♪
[Sarah] Y'all ready?
CJ, go downstairs and get some more boxes.
translation.de: CJ, hol noch ein paar Kartons.

translation.en: I don't want my customers to leave empty-handed.
Of course, babe.
Thank you.
You want me to warm up the leftovers?
I think we made a mistake in moving here.
Gotta figure something out. Quick. 'Cause we're almost out of money.
translation.de: Wir müssen uns was überlegen. Das Geld wird knapp.

translation.en: The new hotel downtown...
they hiring.
I figure you and me, we can go down there, and...
I could be a bellhop, you can do laundry.
translation.de: Ich als Page, du als Waschfrau.

translation.en: You don't just plant a seed and expect fruit the next day.
translation.de: Es braucht Zeit, bis Samen Früchte tragen.

translation.en: The colored women here gotta get used to the idea of somebody else doin' their hair, that's all.
translation.de: Farbige Frauen müssen sich daran gewöhnen, ihre Haare machen zu lassen.

translation.en: Baby... you know I always love your big ideas, but--
translation.de: Baby, du weißt, ich liebe deine Ideen, aber...

translation.en: -I'm not going back to laundry! -Now wait a minute, now.
We done all made sacrifices. You gonna do what's best for this family.
translation.de: Wir brachten alle Opfer. Du tust, was gut für die Familie ist.

translation.en: You hear?
Sarah. Stop.
You got two weeks to turn this around.
After that, you gonna do whatsoever it takes to keep food on that table.
translation.de: Danach tust du irgendwas, was unser Essen bezahlt.

translation.en: -Gentlemen, Wonderful Hair Grower? -No, thank you.
You got dandruff, ma'am? Wonderful Hair Grower!
Ladies, you got bald patches or dandruff?
For your wife?
Good morning, ladies! You want thick, lovely hair?
translation.de: Guten Morgen. Möchten Sie dickes, schönes Haar?

translation.en: [Sarah] Wonderful Hair Grower?
-Wonderful Hair Grower, ma'am? -No.
Wonderful Hair Grower, ladies?
Wonderful Hair Grower? Thank you very much!
Yeah, I'm gonna try this!
-[woman 2] Need this! -[woman 1] We was talkin' about this.
Extra, extra!
Read all about it!
Black Jack Johnson takes on the Great White Hope
translation.de: Black Jack Johnson gegen die Weiße Hoffnung

translation.en: in the fight of the century!
Sisters! Sisters!
Let's talk about hair.
-[man 1] You all right with that there? -[man 2] Yeah, I'm good.
Hair can be freedom or bondage.
translation.de: Haare können Sie befreien oder fesseln.

translation.en: The choice is yours.
Want a better station in life?
[woman 1] What is she sayin'?
Need to make more money?
Come on.
Let me show you how.
[woman 2] Let's hear what she talkin' about.
I had a Cain versus Abel relationship with my hair.
translation.de: Meine Haare und ich waren wie Kain und Abel.

translation.en: -Bet some of y'all do too, huh? -[woman 3] Oh, yeah.
See, I was born free.
Two years after emancipation.
Was orphaned by seven.
Married at 14, pregnant at 15, widowed by 20.
translation.de: Verheiratet mit 14, schwanger mit 15, verwitwet mit 20.

translation.en: Had to fend for myself and my baby girl. Only work I could find was...
translation.de: Ich kämpfte für mich und meine Tochter. Arbeit fand ich nur...

translation.en: in the fields... or as a washerwoman.
Didn't have time to take care of my hair.
translation.de: Für Haarpflege hatte ich keine Zeit.

translation.en: I know you know what I mean.
-[woman 4] Yes. -[Sarah] Hard work on the farm, ain't it?
Wanted to work at the new hotel, but they say I ain't got the right look.
translation.de: Ich wollte im neuen Hotel anfangen, aber mein Aussehen störte sie.

translation.en: How many of y'all know what she talkin' about?
translation.de: Wie viele von Ihnen kennen das?

translation.en: [woman 5] Yes, indeed.
They put us down, don't give us nothin'.
Tell us we're ugly, make us feel ugly.
[woman 6] That's right.
I tell you what. You come by my salon, I'll do your hair for free.
translation.de: Kommen Sie in meinen Salon. Ich mache Ihre Haare umsonst.

translation.en: You got yourself a deal.
Bet you some of y'all are wonderin' why I would do somethin' for nothin'.
translation.de: Sie fragen sich sicher, warum ich das tun sollte.

translation.en: [woman 7] Right.
'Cause I know how hard it is to care for our hair.
translation.de: Weil ich weiß, wie schwer es sein kann.

translation.en: I know what it's like to not have running water or products made for us.
translation.de: Ich weiß, wie es ist, kein fließend Wasser oder Produkte für unser Haar zu haben.

translation.en: But most important, I know if she look good, we all look good.
translation.de: Doch noch wichtiger ist: Wenn sie gut aussieht, tun wir es alle.

translation.en: -[woman 1] Yes! -[woman 2] Right about that.
If you look respectable, we all look respectable.
translation.de: Sehen Sie respektabel aus, tun wir alle es.

translation.en: [women] Mmm. That's right.
Everything we do as Negroes reflects back on us.
translation.de: Alles, was wir als Schwarze tun, fällt auf uns zurück.

translation.en: So if I can help one person, I'm lifting us all up.
translation.de: Wenn ich einer Frau helfen kann, helfe ich uns allen.

translation.en: -[women 3] Yes, lift us. -[woman 4] Okay.
Wonderful Hair Grower gives me the confidence every day...
translation.de: Wonderful Hair Grower gibt mir jeden Tag das Selbstvertrauen,

translation.en: ...to beat the enemy.
Slay the demon.
Fight the good fight as a colored woman in America.
translation.de: Kämpfen Sie als farbige Frauen Amerikas.

translation.en: [woman 1] You gotta stand up.
Wonderful Hair leads to wonderful opportunities.
-[woman 1] Yes. Amen! -You hear me?
-Did you hear me? -[woman 3] Yeah, I heard you.
Now, who wants wonderful opportunities?
Come on up and get your opportunity.
translation.de: Kommen Sie, holen Sie sie sich.

translation.en: Thank you.
Sarah, we need more shampoo!
-You're taking too long! -I'm not gonna rush and burn her.
I'm just asking you to hurry.
Customers can hear y'all.
We need more pullers and pins and oil.
translation.de: Wir brauchen mehr Haarnadeln und Öl.

translation.en: -We need help, Sarah. -Help is on the way.
Now I sent Lelia out for supplies, and a gal named Esther, who came highly recommended, will be here any minute.
translation.de: Lelia holt Nachschub. Gleich kommt eine hochgelobte Esther zum Arbeiten.

translation.en: That's all well and good, but I need to finish this one's hair now.
translation.de: Ich muss sie jetzt fertig machen.

translation.en: -You know how to use a hot comb? -[woman] I do.
translation.de: -Kannst du einen heißen Kamm bedienen? -Ich kann es.

translation.en: [Sarah] Be right back.
-I'm Esther. -Oh.
I can do hair. I can make product. Anything you need.
translation.de: Ich kann frisieren, bei der Herstellung helfen, alles.

translation.en: Check these ladies. See who's dry. Get some Hair Grower and oil their scalp,
translation.de: Sieh nach, wessen Kopf noch nicht eingeölt wurde.

translation.en: don't start pressin' till I make sure you know what you're doin'.
translation.de: Warte mit dem Glätten auf mich. -Sarah! -Ich komme!

translation.en: -[CJ]Sarah! -[Sarah] Coming!
Okay!
-Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry, ma'am. -[woman gasps]
I'm sorry.
-Hey. -[CJ] Yeah. Hey.
I'll be right back. Excuse me for a second.
-Listen, we need more help. -I know. Ain't it wonderful?
translation.de: -Wir brauchen mehr Hilfe. -Ich weiß. Toll, oder?

translation.en: The Hair Grower's doing so well. We should put out more product.
-We barely got enough room to live. -Then let's get a bigger place.
translation.de: -Wir haben kaum Platz zum Leben. -Ziehen wir um.

translation.en: Babe--
We just now making a profit. Can we just enjoy it?
translation.de: Genießen wir erst mal, Profit zu machen?

translation.en: Tonight...
why don't we get a couple of steaks and a bottle of Cognac and sleep in in the morning?
translation.de: ...holen wir Steaks, eine Flasche Cognac, und morgen schlafen wir aus, ja?

translation.en: I want a whole line of products.
Shampoo, pressin' oil,
maybe somethin' for dandruff?
I'm gonna make it easier for colored women to take good care of their hair.
translation.de: Ich erleichtere farbigen Frauen die Haarpflege.

translation.en: There's such a thing as growing too fast. [Sarah] That's why we gotta be smart about it.
translation.de: -Man kann auch zu schnell wachsen. -Darum stellen wir es klug an.

translation.en: Do things professional-like. You know any lawyers?
translation.de: Wir machen es professionell. Kennst du einen Anwalt?

translation.en: Yeah, he been braggin' about his cousin just finished law school.
Since when you been talkin' to the numbers man?
You want me to call him or not?
[woman] Mister!
Ma'am, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
I studied incorporation at Columbia, yes.
translation.de: Ich habe Gesellschaftsgründungen an der Columbia studiert.

translation.en: So you'll look into it?
Mrs. Walker, business can be ruthless.
-Especially for a-- -Colored woman?
Can't be no worse than taking in laundry.
You'll be competing with companies
that make their products for pennies in big factories.
translation.de: die billige Produkte in Fabriken herstellen.

translation.en: That's why I need me a good lawyer. Interested?
translation.de: Darum brauchen wir einen Anwalt. Interesse?

translation.en: [man] You beat my suitcase, boy?
No, sir.
You niggers think you're Jack Johnson now.
translation.de: Ihr Nigger haltet euch für Jack Johnson.

translation.en: Treat a white man's property any old way.
No, sir. I carefully placed it on the cart.
Don't know how it could've gotten scratched.
You're calling me a liar, boy?
How soon can I start?
That's... That's what I'm sayin', Pop. We got big plans for our company.
translation.de: Sage ich ja. Wir haben Großes mit unserer Firma vor.

translation.en: First thing we're gonna do is do what they call incorporating. Make everything legal.
translation.de: Zuerst lassen wir das Unternehmen eintragen.

translation.en: [Cleophus] Boy, you ain't got no sense.
-What's that you're mumblin' about? -You keep sayin' "our company."
translation.de: -Was murmelst du da? -Du sagst immer "unsere Firma".

translation.en: -Sarah calls it her company. -So?
translation.de: Sarah nennt es ihre Firma. Und?

translation.en: You ain't listenin'. Her idea, her product, her money.
translation.de: Du hörst nicht zu. Ihre Idee, ihr Produkt, ihr Geld.

translation.en: -My name. -Your name?
You remember Massa Walker?
Nah. You was too young.
When he would talk to us about the plantation,
translation.de: Wenn er mit uns über die Plantage sprach,

translation.en: he'd always say "our field, our house."
translation.de: sagte er immer "unser Feld, unser Haus".

translation.en: Turns out, that son of a bitch didn't free our asses
translation.de: Und doch hat uns der Mistkerl

translation.en: until two years after the Civil War was over.
translation.de: erst zwei Jahre nach Ende des Bürgerkriegs befreit.

translation.en: What's your point, old man?
What kind of self-respecting Negro works for his wife?
translation.de: Welcher anständige Schwarze arbeitet für seine Frau?

translation.en: I'm making twice as much now than I did back in St. Louis.
translation.de: Ich verdiene doppelt so viel wie vorher.

translation.en: Next thing you'll be wearin' a corset!
Man needs something of his own. Especially a colored man.
translation.de: Ein Mann braucht etwas Eigenes. Besonders ein Farbiger.

translation.en: Never get your money where you get your honey.
[man] One of the great events in sports history.
Heavyweight champion Jack Johnson will defend his crown
against the man who is already a legend in his time.
translation.de: kämpft gegen eine Legende seiner Zeit,

translation.en: Former heavyweight champion James J. Jeffries.
translation.de: den ehemaligen Meister James J. Jeffries.

translation.en: [Cleophus] "Jack Johnson throws a thunderous left!
translation.de: Jack Johnson mit einem gewaltigen linken Haken!

translation.en: Jeffries counters with a jab!"
Mmm! This cake is good.
When I told you to get some cake, I meant to pass out to the guests.
translation.de: Den solltest du an die Gäste verteilen.

translation.en: "Jack Johnson moves in with a slug to the jaw!
Jeffries is down!"
-[men cheering] -Oh! Oh, come on.
Come on, now. Don't fail me now!
Black Jack is winning!
-Oh, I can't-- -Pop!
-Blood pressure-- -Oh, no!
Oh! Oh, God.
-Hurry up, CJ. What is it sayin'? -All right, hold on, man.
Don't jam on me now!
translation.de: Lass mich jetzt nicht im Stich!

translation.en: -What it say, CJ? -All right, here we go.
"Jeffries is down. Will the White Hope rise?"
translation.de: Jeffries ist am Boden. Steht die Weiße Hoffnung wieder auf?

translation.en: No.
The referee calls it. The fight is over.
translation.de: Ringrichter macht Schluss. Es ist vorbei.

translation.en: -Black Jack Johnson won! -[all cheering, shouting]
[Sarah] It's our time now, baby!
Oh, Peggie! Can you believe it?
Sarah, you need to see this.
translation.de: Sarah, das musst du dir ansehen.

translation.en: Addie Munroe has moved here, and she's opening up a salon.
translation.de: Addie Munroe eröffnet hier einen Salon.

translation.en: Mama, where are you goin'? You don't have to worry about Addie!
translation.de: Wo willst du hin? Um Addie musst du dich nicht sorgen.

translation.en: Your place is bigger.
You got more products, more customers, more...
translation.de: Du hast mehr Produkte, mehr Kundinnen, mehr...

translation.en: Oh, no. You can't compete with that.
translation.de: Oh nein. Da kannst du nicht mithalten.

translation.en: [Sarah] "Oh, no" is right.
As I live and breathe. Look who it is, Mama!
translation.de: So wahr ich hier stehe. Sieh, wer da ist, Mama.

translation.en: Afternoon.
[Lelia] How long you and Jean been in Indianapolis?
translation.de: Seit wann seid du und Gene hier?

translation.en: Oh, I'm afraid that Jean's passed.
[Lelia] So sorry for your loss.
Yeah, you have our condolences.
Thank you. It was quite unexpected, but I am ready for a fresh start.
translation.de: Danke. Es kam unerwartet, aber ich bin bereit für einen Neuanfang.

translation.en: My salon in St. Louis is doing so well.
translation.de: Mein Salon in St. Louis läuft so gut.

translation.en: I heard Indianapolis is booming
translation.de: Ich hörte, Indianapolis ist im Aufwind

translation.en: and in dire need of a woman with my talents, so I figured, why not?
translation.de: und braucht dringend eine Frau wie mich. Ich dachte: Wieso nicht?

translation.en: How are you doing, Sarah?
Haven't heard hide nor hair about your little company.
translation.de: Ich habe nichts von deiner Firma gehört.

translation.en: I'm doin' good. Real good. In fact--
translation.de: Mir geht's gut. Sehr gut sogar...

translation.en: Well, I best be getting back.
You have a blessed day now, Addie.
You see that?
-The black eye? -Mm-hmm.
I heard Jean used to beat her silly.
translation.de: Ich hörte, Gene schlug sie immer.

translation.en: He probably ain't dead.
-‹She just running. -Mm-hmm.
Guess light-skin don't mean you gonna have a happy marriage.
translation.de: Helle Haut schützt wohl nicht vor schlechten Ehen.

translation.en: You know, all we women in the same boat.
translation.de: Wir Frauen sitzen im selben Boot.

translation.en: Please. She ain't as much as set a toe in our boat.
translation.de: Bitte. Sie hat keinen Zeh in unser Boot gesetzt.

translation.en: Always gon' be easier for the likes of Addie.
translation.de: Frauen wie sie haben es immer leichter.

translation.en: Soon as she open her salon, all my customers gonna flock to her.
translation.de: Alle meine Kundinnen werden zu ihr wechseln.

translation.en: Don't say that.
Gotta find a way to set myself apart.
[CJ] Riots in seven cities.
[Ransom] I heard ten.
Twenty-six Negroes killed.
All because of Jack Johnson winnin' the fight.
translation.de: Nur weil Jack Johnson den Kampf gewonnen hat.

translation.en: My, my, Gertrude. You look like a schoolgirl.
translation.de: Meine Güte, Gertrude. Du siehst aus wie ein Schulmädchen.

translation.en: That hair sure is growin'.
I can't believe it. My hair ain't never reached my shoulders before.
translation.de: Unfassbar. Es reichte mir noch nie bis zu den Schultern.

translation.en: I see you, Annabelle. Lookin' good.
translation.de: Sieh dich an, Annabeth. Siehst gut aus.

translation.en: Sarah Walker, you are royalty.
translation.de: Sarah Walker, du bist eine Königin.

translation.en: We oughta call you Madam.
How you doin', Addie?
Oh, blessed and highly favored.
Love that.
-♪ I sing because I'm happy ♪ -♪ Ooh ♪
translation.de: Ich singe, weil ich glücklich bin

translation.en: ♪ I sing because I'm free ♪
translation.de: Ich singe, weil ich frei bin

translation.en: ♪ His eye is on the sparrow ♪
translation.de: Sein Auge ist auf den Spatz gerichtet

translation.en: ♪ And I know that he watches me ♪
translation.de: Und ich weiß, dass er zusieht

translation.en: ♪ He watches me ♪
Please be seated.
[minister] Can I get an amen?
[all] Amen.
[minister] Ah, yes, indeed.
Those that are new to Bethel AME,
translation.de: Jene, die neu in der Bethel AME sind...

translation.en: please rise and let us acknowledge your divine presence.
translation.de: Erheben Sie sich, damit wir Sie begrüßen können.

translation.en: [woman whispers] What is she doin'?
[CJ] Where's she goin'?
Ain't no one tell her to go up there.
translation.de: Sie sollte nicht nach vorne gehen.

translation.en: Thank y'all for welcoming me.
I happen to need a fellowship.
[all] Amen.
Just as Jesus has guided my path, and you have opened your doors to me,
translation.de: So wie Jesus mich auf meinem Weg führte und Sie mir Ihre Türen öffneten...

translation.en: I would like to open the doors of my new salon to you.
translation.de: ...möchte ich Ihnen gern die Türen meines neuen Salons öffnen.

translation.en: Addie's won't be no ordinary salon. No, Lord.
translation.de: Addies ist kein gewöhnlicher Salon. Nein, Herr.

translation.en: Next week in the heart of downtown,
I will open the first freestanding storefront,
translation.de: im Herzen der Innenstadt, und nicht in jemandes Küche,

translation.en: not in someone's kitchen, colored salon in all of Indiana.
translation.de: den ersten freistehenden Salon in Indiana von und für Farbige.

translation.en: Thank you.
[echoing faintly] I would like to take this time
to acknowledge those that aren't with us...
[minister] Those that weren't able to make it here today.
translation.de: Jenen, die heute nicht hier sein können.

translation.en: [Addie, echoing] Colored women will do anything to look like me...
translation.de: Farbige Frauen tun alles, um wie ich auszusehen.

translation.en: even if deep down, they know they can't.
translation.de: Obwohl sie wissen, dass es nicht geht.

translation.en: Now we've got a good arrangement here.
Laundry for hair treatments.
Let's not complicate things.
These are my products.
And I will not have the likes of you associated with them.
translation.de: Eine wie du soll nicht damit assoziiert werden.

translation.en: Sarah, come on, open up, now.
Girl, I see you in there. Come on. Open up.
translation.de: Ich sehe dich. Komm. Mach auf.

translation.en: [Addie] You'll fail soon enough.
[referee] Two...
[Addie] And when you do...
[referee] ...four...
[Addie] ...I got a hamper full of dirty laundry with your name on it.
translation.de: ...habe ich einen Korb mit Dreckwäsche für dich.

translation.en: -[CJ] What's goin' on, now? -Saints.
-Sarah... -Can I have your attention, please?
Can I have your attention?
I just wanna share...
the divine message God just sent me.
Now so many of y'all in the congregation have flourished using my product.
translation.de: So viele Gemeindemitglieder sind durch mein Produkt aufgeblüht.

translation.en: Which is why the good Lord...
oh, is he ever so good...
[all] Yes, he is.
...gave me the vision
to lower the price of my Hair Grower as a thank you.
translation.de: den Preis meines Haarwuchsmittels zu senken.

translation.en: Buy one, get one free. Can I get an amen?
translation.de: Zwei zum Preis von einem! Amen?

translation.en: [all] Amen!
I'll be taking orders in the front of the church.
First five ladies get free hair stylin', tell all your friends.
translation.de: Den ersten fünf Damen mache ich die Haare umsonst.

translation.en: Thank you, Jesus. Thank you.
[CJ] It's gonna take us months to fill these orders.
translation.de: Für die Bestellungen brauchen wir Monate.

translation.en: We ain't got enough workers, or storage, or equipment.
translation.de: Uns fehlen Arbeitskräfte, Lagerraum und Werkzeug.

translation.en: This is a house, baby. It ain't a damn factory.
translation.de: Das ist ein Haus, Baby, keine Fabrik.

translation.en: We can do it, CJ. We are doin' it!
translation.de: Wir schaffen das, CJ. Glaub mir!

translation.en: It's doin' good.
-What was that? -[voice shouting]
[Sarah] Everybody out! Come on!
-[Lelia] Go! -[CJ] There's a fire!
-[Lelia] Where's John at? -[Ransom] I don't know. It was his shift.
translation.de: Wo ist John? Es war seine Schicht.

translation.en: [CJ] No! I'll get him. Y'all, go on out! I got it!
translation.de: Nein! Ich hole ihn. Geht ihr raus. Ich mache das.

translation.en: Hey, what's goin' on?
-Did you leave the product burning? -I just stepped outside to smoke.
translation.de: -Das Mittel kochte ohne Aufsicht? -War kurz rauchen.

translation.en: -This is all your f-- -[loud blast]
[Lelia] Mama!
[man] Right here.
[man] Hurry up, now!
[man] Can you pump it any quicker?
All right, keep it goin'.
I never should've let her get to me.
translation.de: Sie hätte mir egal sein sollen.

translation.en: I should've kept my eye on the sparrow.
translation.de: Ich hätte auf den Spatz schauen sollen.

translation.en: It's okay, baby. It's okay.
How we gonna eat?
-Where we gonna sleep? -We gonna figure it out.
Get a job at the hotel if we have to. -We'll figure it out. -[sighs]
translation.de: Wir arbeiten im Hotel, wenn es sein muss. Es wird schon.

translation.en: [man] Come on, now, hurry up!
But if you need a place to go, then, you know where to come,
translation.de: Falls Sie einen Salon brauchen, wissen Sie, wo ich bin.

translation.en: until Sarah gets back on her feet.
You know, let's hope she does that.
I'm right here for you in the meantime. Okay, ladies?
translation.de: In der Zwischenzeit bin ich für Sie da. Ok, Ladys?

translation.en: That's very important that you have somewhere to get your hair done.
translation.de: Es ist sehr wichtig, dass sich jemand um Ihre Haare kümmert.

translation.en: Sarah, I am so sorry.
translation.de: Sarah, es tut mir so leid.

translation.en: I came as soon as I could.
You are so brave.
[Sarah] Please.
Save the crocodile tears. You know you came to gloat.
You're upset, so I won't take that personally.
translation.de: Du bist aufgebracht. Das verstehe ich.

translation.en: Uh, I just came to offer my services, free of charge, to all of your clients.
translation.de: Ich kam nur, um all deinen Kundinnen meine Dienste anzubieten, gratis.

translation.en: You ain't comin' up here stealin' my customers.
translation.de: Du stiehlst mir meine Kundinnen nicht.

translation.en: Well, I would never steal.
You had your foot on my throat for years.
Told me I was worthless, useless, too dark to shine.
translation.de: Sagtest, ich sei wertlos, nutzlos, zu dunkel, um zu strahlen.

translation.en: But the mere inkling that I might be doin' well
made you move over a thousand miles,
clear across country, just to dim my light.
translation.de: durchs Land ziehen, um mich zu dämpfen.

translation.en: You are out of your mind.
Find yourself a new whipping post 'cause them days is over for me.
translation.de: Such dir ein neues Opfer. Wir sind fertig.

translation.en: In fact, take a seat.
'Cause I'm about to replace all this with a factory.
translation.de: Denn ich ersetze das durch eine Fabrik.

translation.en: And leave you in the dust.
translation.de: Und lasse dich im Staub zurück.

translation.en: -Sarah... -No, no, no, no, no.
You want to speak to me?
You call me Madam CJ Walker.
translation.de: Dann nenn mich Madam CJ Walker.

translation.en: ♪ Me, I'm a creator ♪
